oan Amount: The Lender agrees to loan the Borrower the principal sum of
___________________ (the “Loan”), together with interest on the outstanding principal amount
of the Loan (the "Principal Balance"), and in accordance with the terms set forth below.
plain_english: This payment requires compliance with specific requirements.
user_impact: You must follow these low-risk requirements or face consequences.
